title: RP bug on PBE! Please help
body: When I logged into my PBE account, I had no RP or blue essence. Now that it was 00:00, I only got 5 blue essence and still no RP. Is this happening because the loot-systhem is down?

replies.body: PBE account stipends changed recently. Be sure to hit up the [**PBE Boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-there-are-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence) for all of those details.
